mapper.select: SELECT BOARDCODE,BOARDNUM,BOARDNOTICE,USERID,BOARDTITLE,BOARDCONTENT,BOARDDATE,BOARDCOUNT,BOARDFILESRC,BOARDREF,BOARDDEPTH,BOARDSTEP FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN , BOARDCODE,BOARDNUM,BOARDNOTICE,USERID,BOARDTITLE,BOARDCONTENT,BOARDDATE,BOARDCOUNT,BOARDFILESRC,BOARDREF,BOARDDEPTH,BOARDSTEP FROM (SELECT * FROM Board where boardcode = #{boardcode} ORDER BY BOARDREF DESC , BOARDSTEP ASC) ) WHERE RN BETWEEN 1 AND 5
select * from emp where userid =(select userid from board where boardnum=#{boardnum})
select * from empinfo where userid =(select userid from board where boardnum=#{boardnum})
